original_text: but declared first to those in Damascus, then in Jerusalem and throughout all the region of Judea, and also to the Gentiles, that they should repent and turn to God, performing deeds in keeping with their repentance.
korean_text: 먼저 다메섹과 예루살렘에 있는 사람과 유대 온 땅과 이방인에게까지 회개하고 하나님께로 돌아와서 회개에 합당한 일을 하라 전하므로

sentences.original_text: but declared first to those in Damascus
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 먼저 다마스커스에 있는 사람들에게 선포하였고

sentences.original_text: and throughout all the region of Judea
performing deeds in keeping with their repentance
